item.description:
Here's a good opportunity for a glider ride... Take advantage of their gracious offer.... Charley

The glider rides are held by the Greater Boston Soaring Club, at Sterling airport, 3B3. GBSC is the largest glider club in New England, with some 150 members.

This event will probably start around mid-morning and go on until late afternoon, but the best thermals are often from 11:00 till 4:00, for the longer rides. We tow up to 2.5k or 3k ft. then release.

Normally intro rides are $100, and this group rate is $75. The tow planes are Pawnees and a Birddog. I am one of the towpilots.

This year we are offering the discounted rate for a combination of interested groups. Towing should start mid-morning, and it will be first come first served, so get you names on the list ASAP.


As last year, certified pilots should be able to get a glider flight endorsement from a CFIG in their logbook.

Fred will be making a list of those that reply so to better judge the support required for this grand event.


Richard Gammon
